company.name: Mayfair Games
company.description:
The Mayfair Games brand encompasses a wide array of great board games, card games, dice games, and party games.
These are fun and usually educational games full of intrigue and interaction. All offer great replay value. Besides being the world’s leading train game manufacturer, Mayfair publishes games about everything from collecting rare specimens in the Amazon to building city states in ancient Mesopotamia to creating trade routes in renaissance Italy! Manage a gang during the Roaring Twenties or try farming in arid Mexico!

Admin Note:
1981, founded by Darwin Bromley in Chicago, Illinois, United States. 1997, Mayfair Games was shutdown for financial reasons. 1997, Mayfair Games had most of their assets acquired by Iron Crown Enterprises who restarted the company as Ironwind, Inc.; still operating under the Mayfair Games trademark. On February 9, 2018, Mayfair announced it had sold all of its assets to the North American branch of Asmodée Éditions, and would be shutting down.
